yu_focused_filters.comment: ONLY monitor slots containing YU token activity - ignore everything else

programs_when_yu_present.comment: Only care about these programs when YU token is involved

companion_tokens.comment: Only monitor these tokens when they appear WITH YU in the same transaction

filtering_strategy.step1: Check if slot contains YU token activity
filtering_strategy.step2: If no YU token, skip the entire slot
filtering_strategy.step3: If YU token present, check if it interacts with monitored programs
filtering_strategy.step4: Only process transactions that involve YU token
benefits: Reduces processing by ~99% (YU is not in every slot)
Eliminates false positives from unrelated USDC/DEX transactions
Focuses resources on actual YU token activity
Much faster sync speed by skipping irrelevant slots
